annotation_sentence: Yes, I did a project... about market research. We, um, look at data and see... trends for clothing sale.

annotation_sentence: I, um... I analyze data and make, uh, report. I also talk with group... to share idea.

annotation_sentence: I learn... how to use Excel better. And also, um, how to communicate... clearly with team.

annotation_sentence: Ah, yes. We have problem with data... it was not, um, correct. So, I work with my friend to... how to say... fix it?

annotation_sentence: I try to stay... calm. I make list of tasks and do... one by one. It help me not stress.
